name: Corrupted Windblossom
tooltip:
Corrupted Windblossom

You have found a sickly, corrupted version of what appears to be a windblossom plant.  The berries that hang from the plant appear rotten and poisonous.  It desperately needs some sort of attention if it is to be turned back to normal.

Requirements:
- Cenarion Plant Salve x 2
